title: Why now is the time to invest in your autumn ankle boots - and the best styles to try
text:
Some garments and accessories seem so ubiquitous that it can be jarring to remember that they’re subject to shifts in fashion at all. But even the most basic pieces – trainers, denim jackets, jumpers – undergo incremental changes that make all the difference in whether they look current or passé. A T-shirt you see Rachel Green wearing in a Friends rerun will be very different to any version you would wear today.

And so it is with the ankle boot. These have evolved from Victorian riding boots, through mod and punk phases, into footwear so useful that it’s easy to understand why so many women end up owning more than a few pairs. And why not? They’re versatile (the right pair will work with skirts,...
description: Some garments and accessories seem so ubiquitous that it can be jarring to remember that they’re subject to shifts in fashion at all.
